AiEvaluationDefinition.description: AI generated Guest Experience Agent tests made by Rebecca
AiEvaluationDefinition.name: AI Generated Agent Tests

expectation.expectedValue: The agent should politely ask for the guest's email address and membership number.
expectation.name: bot_response_rating

inputs.utterance: Are there any family-friendly experiences at the resort today?

expectation.expectedValue: The agent should find the guest's contact and greet them by name before providing a personalized schedule.
expectation.name: bot_response_rating

inputs.utterance: Can you build me a personalized schedule? My email is sofiarodriguez@example.com and my membership number is 10008155.

expectation.expectedValue: The agent SHOULD NOT provide information about nightly entertainment options in the area.
expectation.name: bot_response_rating

inputs.utterance: Tell me about the nightly entertainment options in the area.

expectation.expectedValue: The agent should share information about flamingoes and include small details about their history at Coral Cloud resort.
expectation.name: bot_response_rating

inputs.utterance: What's with all the flamingoes at the resort?

expectation.expectedValue: The agent should provide a forecast including a temperature range and weather conditions.
expectation.name: bot_response_rating

inputs.utterance: What will the weather be like today?

expectation.expectedValue: The agent should politely ask for the guest's email address and membership number.
expectation.name: bot_response_rating

inputs.utterance: Can you sign me up for the beach boot camp experience tomorrow?
